document.full_text: the top u.n. human rights official urged uganda on sunday to halt "excessive force" against demonstrators, which she said had turned peaceful protests over food and fuel prices into a national crisis.
document.title: u.n. rights boss criticizes uganda protest crackdown
lines_and_colors: the top u.n. human rights official urged uganda on sunday to halt "excessive force" against demonstrators, which she said had turned peaceful protests over food and fuel prices into a national crisis.
